title: IKEA plans to increase the EV fleet used for good deliveries by 40% by 2024-25
description: IKEA announced intentions to increase its fleet of electric delivery vehicles by 40% by 2024-25, aiming for greater sustainability in its supply chain. Already utilizing 200 EVs in cities including Bangalore and Hyderabad, the company plans to adopt an EV-first approach in new markets such as Delhi NCR, set to launch in 2025.
